title: Why Live Caption/ Bubble option is not available yet in Pixel 3 with Android 10
content: According to I/O 2019 that Live Caption / Bubble options comes with Android 10 , after updating my Pixel 3 XL to Android 10 also those options are not available. Not only this there are other options like Screen Calling is also not available in India . I have paid full amount then why it is working in India.
